title.narrative: Training programme on development policy and cooperation

description.narrative: Effectiveness and efficiency of development policy and cooperation require that personnel dealing with the related issues has the knowledge and skills needed in each task.The objective of training is to increase the effectiveness and meaningfulness of work and nurturing of personal resources and abilities. Development policy and development cooperation related learning takes place in face-to-face learning (basics and in-depth studies) Development Policy Days and related workshops and online self-studying.Tr aining is addressed to people in charge of development cooperation related issues in ministries and embassies including the local staff. Another target-group is formed by non-staff Finnish persons recruited for international development cooperation assignm ents. There are also courses that are open for consultants or representatives of other government entities involved in development cooperation implementation.The proposed funding for (EUR 105 000) is intended for organising and develop the training .
